ticker.description: ID of the stock in stock exchange

price_change_in_one_month.description: Price change since 1 month ago. Value of 1 means no change.

price_change_in_five_years.description: Price change since 5 years ago. Value of 1 means no change.

dividend_yield.description: Annual dividend yield. Value of 1 means 100% of the price paid as dividend.
